turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just wanted figure out a place to order a Bella Luna for some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need two large thin crust pizzas. On one of them I want chicken and banana peppers and on the other I want jalapeno and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 large thin crust pizzas, 1 chicken and banana peppers, 1 jalapeno and pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, both of them are thin crust as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $48, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
